string-array.name: words
string-array.item: To cost an arm and a leg.
Let the cat out of the bag.
To kill two birds with one stone.

string-array.name: means
string-array.item: To give something, especially money, in order to provide or achieve something together with other people.
To improve the quality, amount, or strength of something.
To spend time thinking about a possibility or making a decision.
To (cause to) separate into parts or groups.
To make someone able to do something, or to make something possible.
To cause to fill or become covered with water, especially in a way that causes problems.
To form or have a mental picture or idea of something.
To repeatedly hit something, producing a noise.
To cause someone to behave in a particular way.
In an adequate or satisfactory way.
In a way that relates to or affects cognition.
In a way that relates to the development of someone or something.
In a way that relates to economics or finance.
In a way that is true, factual or appropriate; accurately.
Doing something or taking place after the expected, proper, or usual time.
In a way that is easily perceived or understood; clearly.
Not present in a place, at an occasion, or as part of something.
Successful in producing a desired or intended result.
Relating to or caused by bacteria.
(of a surface or background) Unrelieved by decorative or other features; bare, empty, or plain.
Relating to the assistance of those in need.
Used or intended to defend or protect.
Difficult or impossible to understand, explain, or identify.
Means you can enjoy two different opportunities at the same time.
This means that the person you’re just talking about actually appears at that moment.
To solve two problems at once.

string-array.name: sentences
string-array.item: Are not you going to contribute towards Jack is leaving present?
It is things like this that enhance the quality of life.
Do not make any decisions before you have considered the situation.
Smoking is likely to damage your health permanently.
Knead the dough well, then divide it into four pieces.
Some tests enable you to find out the sex of your baby before it is born.
When the river flooded, the footbridge was swept away.
Imagine Robert Redford when he was young - that is what John looks like.
I wish he would knock instead of just barging in.
Like so many people, he is motivated by greed.
He did not believe driver behavior could be improved sufficiently to make the junction acceptably safe.
It serves as a distraction from cognitively demanding tasks.
Hunger is leaving millions of children developmentally delayed.
They won the game with a late goal.
Algebra is, properly speaking, the analysis of equations.
Most students were absent from school at least once.
Charitable works such as care of the sick.
The church spire is visible from miles away.
His colleague had vanished in mysterious circumstances.
By working part-time and looking after her kids two days a week she managed to get the best of both worlds.
Hi Tom, speak of the devil, I was just telling Sara about your new car.
They finally saw eye to eye on the business deal.
I only go to the cinema once in a blue moon.
When pigs fly she’ll tidy up her room.
Fuel these days costs and arm and a leg.
The English test was a piece of cake.
I let the cat out of the bag about their wedding plans.
I’m really feeling under the weather today; I have a terrible cold.
By taking my dad on holiday, I killed two birds with one stone. I got to go away but also spend time with him.
